EmailTemplate.description: RS application approved - Contract Sent and Unsigned
EmailTemplate.name: RS application approved - Contract Sent and Unsigned
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations - your BlueWave Solar Loan application has been approved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName}, Congratulations! Your BlueWave Home Solar Loan Application has been approved!
You should have received your BlueWave Home Solar Loan contract via email from DocuSign. Please sign your contract to complete the process.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar {!Organization.Street} Boston, MA {!Organization.PostalCode}
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.786.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
